documentation.text:
@dev {ERC20} token, including:
  - ability for holders to burn (destroy) their tokens
  - a minter role that allows for token minting (creation)
  - a pauser role that allows to stop all token transfers
 This contract uses {AccessControl} to lock permissioned functions using the
 different roles - head to its documentation for details.
 The account that deploys the contract will be granted the minter and pauser
 roles, as well as the default admin role, which will let it grant both minter
 and pauser roles to other accounts.
 This contract is adapted from openzeppelin/contracts/presets/ERC20PresetMinterPauser.sol,
 where burn is only allowed for addresses with BURNER_ROLE

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have minter role to mint"

arguments.value: ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have minter role to mint

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have minter role to mint"

documentation.text:
@dev Creates `amount` new tokens for `to`.
 See {ERC20-_mint}.
 Requirements:
 - the caller must have the `MINTER_ROLE`.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have pauser role to pause"

arguments.value: ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have pauser role to pause

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have pauser role to pause"

documentation.text:
@dev Pauses all token transfers.
 See {ERC20Pausable} and {Pausable-_pause}.
 Requirements:
 - the caller must have the `PAUSER_ROLE`.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have pauser role to unpause"

arguments.value: ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have pauser role to unpause

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have pauser role to unpause"

documentation.text:
@dev Unpauses all token transfers.
 See {ERC20Pausable} and {Pausable-_unpause}.
 Requirements:
 - the caller must have the `PAUSER_ROLE`.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have burner role to burn"

arguments.value: ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have burner role to burn

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have burner role to burn"

documentation.text:
@dev Destroys `amount` tokens from the caller.
 Requirements
 - msg.sender must have BURNER_ROLE
 See {ERC20-_burn}.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have burner role to burn"

arguments.value: ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have burner role to burn

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ERC20MinterPauserBurner: must have burner role to burn"

documentation.text:
@dev Destroys `amount` tokens from `account`, deducting from the caller's
 allowance.
 See {ERC20-_burn} and {ERC20-allowance}.
 Requirements:
 - the caller must have allowance for ``accounts``'s tokens of at least
 `amount`.
 - msg.sender must have BURNER_ROLE
